name: create-hash
notes: create-hash is a Node.js crypto.createHash polyfill (part of crypto-browserify) that provides hash digest functions (md5, sha1, sha256, sha512, etc.). Fails with 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'slice')' due to Buffer implementation incompatibilities. Workers has the built-in Web Crypto API (crypto.subtle.digest) which is the modern standard for hashing and provides better performance.
